SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.util

Class MathUtil

java.lang.Object
net.elena.murat.util.MathUtil
public final class MathUtil extends Object
Mathematical helper functions for 3D graphics and ray tracing. All methods are thread-safe and deterministic.

      Calculates ray-plane intersection.
      Parameters:
      rayOrigin - Ray starting point
      rayDir - Ray direction (normalized)
      planePoint - Point on the plane
      planeNormal - Plane normal (normalized)
